com.steadystate.css.format

Interface CSSFormatable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCSSRuleImpl, AndConditionImpl, AttributeConditionImpl, BeginHyphenAttributeConditionImpl, CharacterDataSelectorImpl, ChildSelectorImpl, ClassConditionImpl, ConditionalSelectorImpl, CounterImpl, CSSCharsetRuleImpl, CSSFontFaceRuleImpl, CSSImportRuleImpl, CSSMediaRuleImpl, CSSPageRuleImpl, CSSRuleListImpl, CSSStyleDeclarationImpl, CSSStyleRuleImpl, CSSStyleSheetImpl, CSSUnknownRuleImpl, CSSValueImpl, DescendantSelectorImpl, DirectAdjacentSelectorImpl, ElementSelectorImpl, GeneralAdjacentSelectorImpl, IdConditionImpl, LangConditionImpl, LexicalUnitImpl, MediaQuery, OneOfAttributeConditionImpl, PrefixAttributeConditionImpl, Property, PseudoClassConditionImpl, PseudoElementSelectorImpl, RectImpl, RGBColorImpl, SelectorListImpl, SubstringAttributeConditionImpl, SuffixAttributeConditionImpl, SyntheticElementSelectorImpl

    public interface CSSFormatable
    Common interface for all classes supporting formated output.
    Author:
    rbri

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getCssText(CSSFormat format)
      Returns a string representation of the rule based on the given format.

    • Method Detail

      • getCssText

        String getCssText(CSSFormat format)
        Returns a string representation of the rule based on the given format. If provided format is null, the result is the same as getCssText()
        Parameters:
        format - the formatting rules
        Returns:
        the formated string
